Message:
Once I had all the
materials I needed,
I quickly got to work.

I cut cloth, then sew
the pieces together.
Each stitch of the needle
fills the gift with
a piece of my heart.

You saved me from
that ice-cold dungeon.

I’m a witch, but you always
fill my darkness with light.
My kind, beloved prince.

I stuff the gift with pieces
of cotton and my heart,
and the thread seals
them all inside.

Oh my prince,
I just know this gift—
this handmade doll—
will make you happy...

In a way,
the doll takes after me.
Not in how it looks,
but in how it feels.

this doll’s filled with
so much of my “love...”
